vehicletrends 0.0.1

  • Changelog

Estimated annual VMT by powertrain and vehicle type

Source: R/data.R
vmt_annual_type.Rd

Estimated annual vehicle miles traveled for each combination of powertrain and vehicle type. Computed by fitting OLS regressions of total odometer miles on vehicle age (in years) for used vehicle listings; the slope coefficient represents the estimated annual VMT.

data(vmt_annual_type)

Format

A data frame with 31 rows and 3 variables:

VariableDescription
vehicle_typeVehicle type: "Car", "CUV", "SUV", "Pickup", "Minivan"
powertrainPowertrain category: "Gasoline", "Battery Electric (BEV)", "Hybrid Electric (HEV)", "Plug-In Hybrid Electric (PHEV)", "Diesel", "Flex Fuel (E85)"
vmt_annualEstimated annual vehicle miles traveled

Source

Computed from used vehicle listings data from Marketcheck.

Examples

data(vmt_annual_type)

head(vmt_annual_type)
#>   vehicle_type             powertrain vmt_annual
#> 1          Car Battery Electric (BEV)   6311.074
#> 2          CUV Battery Electric (BEV)   9254.098
#> 3          Car               Gasoline   9455.110
#> 4          SUV Battery Electric (BEV)   6173.904
#> 5          CUV               Gasoline  10826.925
#> 6      Minivan               Gasoline  10401.421
